gist.headline: Six new flowers in the garden
gist.blurb: The community garden just got bigger! We've added six fresh apps to the showcase, from productivity tools to fashion generators.
gist.summary: Added six new community applications to the showcase including Textify, Pollenboard, and SnapSell, updating the registry schema.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and use six new tools built by the community for text, productivity, and image generation.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the Bee tending to a garden patch where 6 new, distinct pixel flowers have just sprouted. Represents the 6 new apps added to the ecosystem.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of Polly the Bee watering a garden row where 6 distinct, colorful pixel flowers have just bloomed. Each flower looks unique. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'NEW APPS'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, chunky sprites.
